Gotcha, though we are planning to release ign-physics this week, which will lock in some data structures for major version 1. What do you think about converting that struct to something like:

using Collision1Type = ShapePtrType;
using Collision2Type = ShapePtrType;
using Point = VectorType;
using Contact = RequireData<Collision1Type, Collision2Type, Point>;

It should allow additional fields to be added while we figure out the datatypes.
